#Load libraries and data

```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(naniar)

mean<-read_csv(file=here("data","ECHO_data_summarized_mean_values.csv"))
names(mean)

#the kg_per_month_TN..IN are from the units that were loads to begin with
#the kg_N_TN_per_month...kg_N_IN_per_month" are the ones we calculated

str(mean$kg_per_month_IN)

```
